name: Chronic Expansion
desc: Killing an enemy increases your damage by 3.5% (+1% per stack) , up to 10 (+5 per stack) , for 7s . Dealing damage refreshes the timer.
notes:
Chronic Expansion is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Seekers of the Storm expansion.
Every enemy killed grants a   buff that increases damage by 3.5% (+1% per stack) and lasts for 7 seconds. The buff can be stacked up to 10 times (+5 per stack). Dealing damage resets the buff's duration.


== Notes ==
The item displays a bright red counter on the player's body. After killing an enemy, the counter turns green and increases to display how many enemies the player has killed with the buff active. When the buffs are about to expire, the counter blinks and a beeping sound plays.
The item plays a jingle after reaching the maximum amount of buff stacks.
